cause.description:
I support same sex marriages and I think that it is important to have people realize that it is alright to do this.
1. Same sex marriage is ok to have in the world.
2. Gays/Lesbians should be able to have the same relationships that straight people in the world do.
cause.mission: Support Same Sex Marriage and to let people know that gays and lesbians are being stripped of there rights to not be able to marry.
cause.name: Support Same Sex Marriages both Gay and Lesbian
